thread.title: Ground News - City kite festival flies on for third year
thread.title_full: Ground News - City kite festival flies on for third year

author: Longview News-Journal
title: Ground News - City kite festival flies on for third year
text:
Summary by Longview News-Journal As organizers set up booths and prepared for the crowds, gray skies and a light mist had James Ward a little worried about the success of the third annual Longview Kite Fest on Wednesday. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
